SELECT review_board_no, account_id, review_title, review_content, review_like_count, review_view_count, review_reg_date, review_modify FROM review
WHERE review_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE review_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE review_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR review_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY review_board_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{amount}
